job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Support +20 miljoen klanten
       Sterk Nederlands merk
       Inclusieve werkgever
       Werken aan vitaal Nederland

   Snel naar:
   Wat ga je doen?
   Wat wij bieden
   Je werkweek
   Wat breng je mee
   Je collega's
   Je werkplek
   Unlock Your Potential as an Azure GenAI Platform Engineer at NN! Are you ready to revolutionize NN with cutting-edge technology? At NN, our advanced Customer Data Platform (CUDAP) empowers our colleagues to serve customers faster and better. We are on the lookout for a passionate individual to focus on our AI services within this unique platform.As an Azure GenAI Platform Engineer, you'll be at the heart of our technological advancements, ensuring the seamless use and continuous expansion of our platform. You will work with groundbreaking techniques and methodologies to help us create the ultimate AI Platform of NN.

   Wat ga je doen?

   In collaboration with a dynamic team, you'll maintain and enhance our platform, with Azure as your steadfast ally. Data Engineers and Data Scientists across the organization will rely on your expertise for top-notch service. You'll tackle fascinating challenges, introducing and applying new components to make the lives of your colleagues easier and more efficient.

   The ever-evolving Azure ecosystem will be your playground, where you will deploy the latest Microsoft technologies. Our goal is to provide exceptional support to our colleagues while minimizing manual tasks. You will work with tools like Azure API Manager, Azure OpenAI, and Log Analytics, as well as Azure DevOps and Git. Our team also delves into Function Apps, Web Apps, Databricks, SQL servers, and more.

   Imagine being at the forefront of AI innovation, where your day-to-day work directly contributes to the transformation of our organisation. As an Azure AI Platform Engineer, you'll dive deep into the AI side of our platform, enhancing the Azure API Manager with cutting-edge functionality to manage OpenAI resources in an intelligent way. Your expertise will help guide users in connecting via Python, making their experience effortless and efficient.

   Embrace a dynamic role where next to this you also rotate with your colleagues, stepping into the crucial role of platform administrator for two weeks every two months overseeing the complete platform. This responsibility ensures you have a holistic understanding of our system, making you an indispensable part of our team.

   In a nutshell, your role will encompass:
     * Lead and Innovate: Take charge of our Azure infrastructure, ensuring it's robust and scalable to meet our evolving needs
     * Deliver Reliability: Your proficiency will ensure a platform that is not only reliable but also high-performing and resilient
     * Master of Tools: Utilize your skills in PowerShell and Python to streamline operations and automate tasks, driving efficiency across the board
     * Pipeline Pro: Leverage your knowledge of Pipelines within Azure DevOps to maintain a seamless CI/CD process, ensuring rapid and safe deployments
     * Infrastructure as Code: Implement 'Infrastructure as Code' practices using ARM templates and Terraform, creating a more predictable and manageable infrastructure
     * Security Guru: Apply your expertise to secure the platform optimally, protecting our data and ensuring compliance with best practices

   Join us in this exciting journey where you will be empowered to innovate, collaborate, and make a significant impact. Your role will be pivotal in shaping the future of our AI platform, making it an exceptional place to work and grow.
job_details.full_text:
Azure GenAI Platform Engineer

Support +20 miljoen klanten
       Sterk Nederlands merk
       Inclusieve werkgever
       Werken aan vitaal Nederland

   Snel naar:
   Wat ga je doen?
   Wat wij bieden
   Je werkweek
   Wat breng je mee
   Je collega's
   Je werkplek
   Unlock Your Potential as an Azure GenAI Platform Engineer at NN! Are you ready to revolutionize NN with cutting-edge technology? At NN, our advanced Customer Data Platform (CUDAP) empowers our colleagues to serve customers faster and better. We are on the lookout for a passionate individual to focus on our AI services within this unique platform.As an Azure GenAI Platform Engineer, you'll be at the heart of our technological advancements, ensuring the seamless use and continuous expansion of our platform. You will work with groundbreaking techniques and methodologies to help us create the ultimate AI Platform of NN.

   Wat ga je doen?

   In collaboration with a dynamic team, you'll maintain and enhance our platform, with Azure as your steadfast ally. Data Engineers and Data Scientists across the organization will rely on your expertise for top-notch service. You'll tackle fascinating challenges, introducing and applying new components to make the lives of your colleagues easier and more efficient.

   The ever-evolving Azure ecosystem will be your playground, where you will deploy the latest Microsoft technologies. Our goal is to provide exceptional support to our colleagues while minimizing manual tasks. You will work with tools like Azure API Manager, Azure OpenAI, and Log Analytics, as well as Azure DevOps and Git. Our team also delves into Function Apps, Web Apps, Databricks, SQL servers, and more.

   Imagine being at the forefront of AI innovation, where your day-to-day work directly contributes to the transformation of our organisation. As an Azure AI Platform Engineer, you'll dive deep into the AI side of our platform, enhancing the Azure API Manager with cutting-edge functionality to manage OpenAI resources in an intelligent way. Your expertise will help guide users in connecting via Python, making their experience effortless and efficient.

   Embrace a dynamic role where next to this you also rotate with your colleagues, stepping into the crucial role of platform administrator for two weeks every two months overseeing the complete platform. This responsibility ensures you have a holistic understanding of our system, making you an indispensable part of our team.

   In a nutshell, your role will encompass:
     * Lead and Innovate: Take charge of our Azure infrastructure, ensuring it's robust and scalable to meet our evolving needs
     * Deliver Reliability: Your proficiency will ensure a platform that is not only reliable but also high-performing and resilient
     * Master of Tools: Utilize your skills in PowerShell and Python to streamline operations and automate tasks, driving efficiency across the board
     * Pipeline Pro: Leverage your knowledge of Pipelines within Azure DevOps to maintain a seamless CI/CD process, ensuring rapid and safe deployments
     * Infrastructure as Code: Implement 'Infrastructure as Code' practices using ARM templates and Terraform, creating a more predictable and manageable infrastructure
     * Security Guru: Apply your expertise to secure the platform optimally, protecting our data and ensuring compliance with best practices

   Join us in this exciting journey where you will be empowered to innovate, collaborate, and make a significant impact. Your role will be pivotal in shaping the future of our AI platform, making it an exceptional place to work and grow.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with Azure GenAI services, specifically Azure OpenAI, and integrating these into a platform. It mentions developing and enhancing AI platforms, managing OpenAI resources, and guiding users in connecting via Python. While there's mention of Data Engineers and Data Scientists, the core focus is on building and maintaining the platform that supports these AI services, aligning with the definition of a GenAI Engineer who designs, develops, fine-tunes, and deploys applications built on generative models.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves enhancing the Azure API Manager with cutting-edge functionality to manage OpenAI resources, guiding users in connecting via Python, and working with Function Apps and Web Apps, which are all indicative of building and integrating AI features into applications and services.
job_tasks.phrase: enhancing the Azure API Manager with cutting-edge functionality to manage OpenAI resources

job_tasks.justification: Guiding users in connecting via Python implies developing interfaces or providing support for programmatic access to AI services, a core aspect of software development in an AI context.
job_tasks.phrase: guide users in connecting via Python

job_tasks.justification: The role involves maintaining and enhancing the platform with Azure as the primary tool, deploying the latest Microsoft technologies, and working with Azure DevOps and Git, which are all key components of MLOps and platform management.
job_tasks.phrase: maintain and enhance our platform, with Azure as your steadfast ally

job_tasks.justification: Working with Azure DevOps and Git is directly related to CI/CD pipelines and version control, essential for MLOps.
Leveraging knowledge of Pipelines within Azure DevOps to maintain a seamless CI/CD process is a direct MLOps responsibility.
job_tasks.phrase: Leverage your knowledge of Pipelines within Azure DevOps to maintain a seamless CI/CD process

job_tasks.justification: Implementing 'Infrastructure as Code' practices using ARM templates and Terraform is a fundamental aspect of modern infrastructure management and MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: Implement 'Infrastructure as Code' practices using ARM templates and Terraform

job_tasks.justification: Securing the platform optimally, protecting data, and ensuring compliance are critical operational responsibilities for any production system, especially AI platforms.
job_tasks.phrase: secure the platform optimally, protecting our data and ensuring compliance with best practices

job_tasks.justification: Data Engineers and Data Scientists will rely on the platform engineer's expertise for service, indicating a supporting role in the data lifecycle, though not the primary focus.
job_tasks.phrase: Data Engineers and Data Scientists across the organization will rely on your expertise for top-notch service

job_tasks.justification: The role involves working with Azure OpenAI, which is a direct interaction with generative models, and enhancing the platform to manage these resources.
The core of the role is to focus on AI services within the Customer Data Platform and create the ultimate AI Platform, implying work with generative AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: focus on our AI services within this unique platform

job_tasks.justification: The job title itself, 'Azure GenAI Platform Engineer', directly points to working with Generative AI models.

soft_skills.phrase: In collaboration with a dynamic team
The ever-evolving Azure ecosystem will be your playground
Take charge of our Azure infrastructure
